contentList.content: Chromatic Blade
This blade shimmers with elemental force.
Chromatic Barrier
The magic of your blade forms a barrier around you that protects you from harm.
Your chromatic barrier blocks damage equal to its charges and then loses 1 charge. Dealing damage with the Chromatic Blade adds 1 charge, up to your level.
Chromatic Weapon
Imbue a weapon with elemental power. It receives a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, and deals an additional 1d4 damage of your choice.
